mapper.insert: insert into db_unionlog (SEQUENCEID, UNIONORDERID, OPER, RESERVE1, OPERTIME, SOURCEORDERID, FLAG, SOURCESELLID) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionorderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sourceorderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sourcesellid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_unionlog set UNIONORDERID = #{unionorderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SOURCEORDERID = #{sourceorderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SOURCESELLID = #{sourcesellid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, UNIONORDERID, OPER, RESERVE1, OPERTIME, SOURCEORDERID, FLAG, SOURCESELLID from db_unionlog
